Module org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap
Package org.nasdanika.html.model.bootstrap

Interface TableConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Subinterfaces:
Table
All Known Implementing Classes:
TableImpl
public interface TableConfiguration extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
A representation of the model object 'Table Configuration'. Configuration of [bootstrap table](https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.0/content/tables/)

The following features are supported:

  • Dark
  • Striped
  • Bordered
  • Borderless
  • Hover
  • Small
See Also:
  • BootstrapPackage.getTableConfiguration()

      boolean isHover()
